text: John Lynch (2 May 1890 - 6 November 1930) was an Irish Gaelic footballer who played for Cork Senior Championship club Macroom. He played for the Cork senior football team for five seasons, during which time he usually lined out as a right corner-back. ==Honours== ;Macroom *Cork Senior Football Championship (4): 1909, 1910, 1912, 1913 ;Cork *All-Ireland Senior Football Championship (1): 1911 *Munster Senior Football Championship (1): 1911 ==References== Category:1890 births Category:1930 deaths Category:Macroom Gaelic footballers Category:Cork inter-county Gaelic footballers Category:Winners of one All-Ireland medal (Gaelic football)
title: John Lynch (Cork Gaelic footballer)
